banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: My ghost town road trip

nodes.whoTheyAre: No one knows a good ghost town than Abbey Williams. As those once bustling towns continue to litter the American landscape with its skeletal-like structures, Williams can’t help but wonder what’s to become of our habitats. After interning at State Street Global Advisors for two summers, Williams returned to provide administrative support to the Institutional Client Group’s Mid-Atlantic Relationship Management team.

videoData.description: Explorer and artist Abbey Williams has focused her lens on an eclectic collection of ghost towns that litter the American landscape. With a portfolio of haunting images, Williams contemplates the transitory nature of the places we inhabit, ultimately asking: what do these abandoned cityscapes reveal to us about our modern cities and towns?
